# BrainySoftware

> Custom software development company based in Tallinn, Estonia with 15+ years of experience.

BrainySoftware is an IT company specializing in custom software development, low-code solutions, and product design. We serve enterprises, SMEs, and technology companies across fintech, telecom, banking, healthcare, insurance, and retail industries.

## Services

- [Web Development](https://brainysoft.biz/services): Custom web application development with modern technologies
- [Mobile Development](https://brainysoft.biz/services): Native and cross-platform mobile app development
- [QA & Testing](https://brainysoft.biz/services): Comprehensive multi-stage testing and software auditing
- [IT Consultancy](https://brainysoft.biz/services): Technology strategy, workflow optimization, app portfolio consolidation
- [UI/UX Design](https://brainysoft.biz/services): User-centered design process for digital products
- [Dedicated Team](https://brainysoft.biz/services): Skilled professional teams for long-term projects
